entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
